file_content.text: Jokull is gone. Gorma-Koss is silent.
Return to Voss-Ka. Laryn-Ki will answer.
Without Jokull, the Gormak will fall.
The Gormak have become bold. Jokull leads them.
Who or what is Jokull?
They have a leader?
Their most fearsome warrior.
Take him out, then.
We have struggled.
How much damage can one Gormak do?
Why does that matter?
Jokull is unlike other Gormak.
The Gormak were savages. Now they build cannons, ships.
Jokull gives the Gormak purpose. They grow stronger.
Has anyone tried talking to Jokull?
Maybe he'll negotiate.
The Gormak are not Voss. They understand only war.
The Gormak must want something.
Why do they fight us?
The Gormak would destroy us. That is their only motive.
How do we stop him?
All Gormak resources went into that cannon. Gorma-Koss is exposed. We must strike.
Rade-Sa will lead the commandos.
You will defeat the Gormak. Your skills seem adequate.
You must be an expert on fighting the Gormak.
Glad to have you.
We have fought for years. Many have died.
Thanks--I think.
Outsiders rarely impress.
I can't waste time protecting some tagalong commandos.
I don't need help.
You will need a guide.
Jokull rules from Gorma-Koss. Their strongest stand guard.
The Gormak have many defenses. The commandos will clear a path.
While Jokull lives, the Gormak are unstoppable. He must die.
If Jokull leaves me no choice, I'll do what's necessary.
Maybe--not in cold blood.
Strike first, or you will die.
This may be your only chance to speak with the Gormak king.
Death is final, you know.
Good.
If Jokull dies, the Gormak will want revenge.
Could make things worse.
Defeat begins with Jokull's death.
Sounds like this guy's lost his chance at a deal anyway.
Can't argue with you there.
The Gormak are a disease.
I'll follow your orders.
Nice and uncomplicated.
The Gormak have killed many. Do not treat this lightly.
The commandos strike first. Follow the vision, outsider.
This is our chance. Do not hesitate.
Enter Gorma-Koss. Find Jokull. Go now.
Voss-Ka is safe. You fought bravely.
We saw the cannon. We should have struck first.
Voss-Ka is in danger. Do not delay.
You risk your life, outsider. Return to Voss-Ka.
